name: MafiaRace
description:
This game is a result of experimenting with Unity and boredom. It is inspired by an original Mafia game. To be specific, mission "Fair Play". The vehicles and race circuit models are created to be as similar to the original ones as possible.

You will experience of the 1930's racing in the new coat. You can choose from the four racing vehicles which are unlocked by completing various challenges. Each vehicle has its own behaviour and specifics. For now, there is only one race circuit available.

You can also compete with others about fastest lap performed. Check a talbe at http://mafiarace.pythonanywhere.com/
